description.english: At least this was less frustrating than the other times you had to do so... right?
description.german: Wenigstens war das weniger frustrierend als die anderen Male, die du das tun musstest... oder?
description.french: Au moins, c'était moins frustrant que les autres fois où vous l'avez fait, non ?
description.italian: Almeno è stato meno frustrante delle altre volte che hai dovuto farlo, non credi?
description.koreana: 적어도 다른 것보다는 덜 좌절스럽지 않았나요... 그렇죠?
description.spanish: Al menos esta vez ha sido menos frustrante que las anteriores... ¿verdad?
description.russian: Ну, по крайней мере, это было повеселее, чем в прошлый раз, верно?
description.japanese: すくなくとも　いぜん　おなじことを　しなきゃいけなかったときより　いらだちは　すくないんじゃない？
description.polish: Przynajmniej było to mniej frustrujące niż w innych sytuacjach... Nie?
description.turkish: En azından bu, önceki seferler kadar sinir bozucu değildi... Öyle değil mi?
description.brazilian: Pelo menos não foi tão ruim quanto as outras vezes... não é?
